svg.text: 16-24 weeks of intensive system building, learning, and adaptation
THE FOUNDATION PHASE: WHERE 80% OF EFFORT CREATES 90% OF VALUE
No templates exist, every decision is custom, constant learning curve
All future implementations scale from patterns established here
Working system + documented templates + trained users + external auditor acceptance
Weeks 9-14: Technical Foundation - Everything Must Work From Scratch
Weeks 15-20: Converting Business Requirements into System Configuration
‚Ä¢ User roles: 47 users across 6 role types
‚Ä¢ Testing procedures: Custom for each control
Weeks 21-24: Getting Users Productive in the New System
‚Ä¢ Power user bootcamp: 16-hour intensive for 8 analysts
‚Ä¢ End user workshops: 4-hour sessions for 35 users
‚Ä¢ Communication plan: Weekly updates, success stories
‚Ä¢ Support model: 24/7 help desk during transition
‚Ä¢ User manuals: Role-specific guides with screenshots
Weeks 25-28: Proving the System Works Before Go-Live
Why First Implementations Take 6 Months Longer Than Planned
‚Ä¢ Process owners too busy for meetings
‚Ä¢ "That's not how we actually do it"
‚úÖ FOUNDATION COMPLETE: SYSTEM READY FOR FIRST SOX CYCLE
‚Ä¢ Working platform with all integrations ‚Ä¢ 47 controls configured
‚Ä¢ 156 templates created ‚Ä¢ All lessons documented for next implementation
‚Ä¢ 47 users certified ‚Ä¢ External auditor approved ‚Ä¢ Go-live authorized
TOTAL: 28 weeks foundation + 8 weeks delays = 36 weeks (9 months) to reach operational readiness
